title: DIMEX proudly announces its first partnered internships in Morocco at ORNX Green Hydrogen | Middle Eastern Studies

The Dartmouth Initiative for Middle East Exchange (DIMEX) program aims to strengthen academic and professional partnerships between Dartmouth and the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region.
The Dartmouth Initiative for Middle East Exchange (DIMEX), a three-year pilot program aimed at strengthening academic and professional partnerships between Dartmouth and the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region, proudly announces its first partnered internships in Morocco with ORNX Green Hydrogen.
The two positions have been designated as:
The DIMEX program seeks to build relationships with universities and other organizations in the region and aims to provide educational exchange, collaborative research, and tailored academic experiences for faculty and students.

organizations.name: Dartmouth Initiative for Middle East Exchange
